Class BetLoggingAuthority

java.lang.Object
gamblingauthoritiy.BetLoggingAuthority
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBetLoggingAuthority
public class BetLoggingAuthority
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBetLoggingAuthority
See interface for described behaviour

  • Constructor Details

    • BetLoggingAuthority

      public BetLoggingAuthority()

  • Method Details

    • logHandOutGamblingCard

      public void logHandOutGamblingCard​(GeneralID card)
      Description copied from interface: IBetLoggingAuthority
      this method logs when a PlayerCard has been handed out to a Gambler.

      it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

      this method MUST be used when a gambling card is handed out by the cashier.

      Specified by:
      logHandOutGamblingCard in interface IBetLoggingAuthority

    • logHandInGamblingCard

      public void logHandInGamblingCard​(GeneralID card, java.util.Set<BetID> betsMade)
      Description copied from interface: IBetLoggingAuthority
      this method logs the PlayerCard which is turned in by a Gambler. All betID's on it are logged by the authority.

      it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

      this method MUST be used when a gambling card is handed in at the cashier.

      Specified by:
      logHandInGamblingCard in interface IBetLoggingAuthority

    • logStartBettingRound

      public void logStartBettingRound​(IBettingRound startingBettingRound)
      Description copied from interface: IBetLoggingAuthority
      this method logs when a BettingRound starts. It should be called before any submitted bets are added to a betting round.

      it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

      this method MUST be used when a betting round is started.

      Specified by:
      logStartBettingRound in interface IBetLoggingAuthority

    • logAddAcceptedBet

      public void logAddAcceptedBet​(Bet acceptedBet, BettingRoundID bettingRoundID, GamingMachineID gamingMachineID)
      Description copied from interface: IBetLoggingAuthority
      this method logs an accepted bet by a BettingRound. It should be called: after startBettingRound is called, before endBettingRound is called

      it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

      this method MUST be used when an accepted bet is added to a betting round.

      Specified by:
      logAddAcceptedBet in interface IBetLoggingAuthority

    • logEndBettingRound

      public void logEndBettingRound​(IBettingRound endedBettingRound, BetResult result)
      Description copied from interface: IBetLoggingAuthority
      this method logs when a BettingRound ends. It should be called after the winner of a betting round has been decided. all information in the betting Round are logged by the authority.

      it's used for logging purposes by the betlogging authority.

      this method MUST be used when a betting round has ended and the winner is determined.

      Specified by:
      logEndBettingRound in interface IBetLoggingAuthority
